bug.author: nan-wang
bug.summary: error detection method in hubio makes false positive detection
bug.description:
Describe the bug In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/blob/master/jina/docker/hubio.py#L167>https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/blob/master/jina/docker/hubio.py#L167</denchmark-link> , The following log messages are misclassified to errors, <denchmark-code> HubIO@11[C]:Get:18 http://deb.debian.org/debian buster/main amd64 liberror-perl all 0.17027-2 [30.9 kB] HubIO@11[C]: warnings.warn(error_info) </denchmark-code>
Describe how you solve it <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment Screenshots â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://jinaai.atlassian.net/browse/JINACORE-196>Jira Task</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
The normal error message looks like, <denchmark-code> HubIO@11[C]:ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: /usr/local/bin/python -u -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-install-njl2lw91/fairseq/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-install-njl2lw91/fairseq/setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' install --record /tmp/pip-record-9kx645kw/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile --install-headers /usr/local/include/python3.7m/fairseq Check the logs for full command output.
</denchmark-code>
